about_me.des: I am a software engineer with website development, automation Ops and writing scripts experience. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, travel makes my life more colorful. I can make lots of friends when I coding and travel.

projects.E-Commerce: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.AODV: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.Linux: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.WordPress: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am doing some projects on .NET platform
career.netease_des: Research on security of protocols for wireless networks.
career.ucloud_des: I worked as a software engineer for 2 months in Xi'an R&D centre of Applied Materials, Inc.
career.college_des: I graduated from Xi'an Jiaotong University (XJTU) on the subject of Mechanical Engineering at July 2010.
